source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup
source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.

items.title: The Art of HENNA
items.headline: Learning the art of HENNA
objectives_summary: The aim of this course is to show to the students the awesome art of henna.
How to become competent enough to prepare and apply henna to themselves and to athers.
Master the art of henna application.

objectives_summary: Creating nail art of different complexity

items.title: Sculptured nails from "A" to "Z". Acrylic technology.

visible_instructors.name: Viktoriia Klopotova Professional Nail

items.headline: Nail extension shapes: square, almond, stiletto, pipe, bridget, Edge, butterfly
objectives_summary: After completing the course, the student will have the knowledge necessary to perform safe and proper acrylic nail extension.

items.headline: How to make varieties body lotions ( skin care course)
objectives_summary: You  will know how to choose the right carrier oil for making lotion specific to your skin's needs.
You will know how to select the correct equipment for creating your lotions
You will learn how to formulate your own lotion , and different variations of making moisturizers upon the formulas provided in this class..

items.title: How To Make Natural, Clean Beauty Products
items.headline: Make clean beauty products at home with natural ingredients for hair, skin and makeup.
objectives_summary: Learn about your skin microbiome
Learn how a damaged skin microbiome can lead to common skin conditions
Learn how to create natural products for cleansing and moisturising your skin

items.title: Becoming a World Class Esthetician: Part 2
items.headline: Science of Skin
objectives_summary: Learn the Science of Skin from a Medical Doctor (who is also an experienced lecturer)
Understand the 7 Key Influences of Skin beyond genetics
Understand how the client's lifestyle and exposure contributes to various challenges and issues

objectives_summary: Do hairstyles with confidence as you gain skills that keep you in very high demand whether you're a professional or beginner! Faux Locs,Crochet braids hair styles, Cornrow,Twist and Types of ladies hairstyles

objectives_summary: How to make plastic cone

items.title: Luxury Facials:  Ultimate Customer Skincare Experiences

visible_instructors.title: Heather Stockley
visible_instructors.name: Heather
visible_instructors.job_title: Top Qualified Global Skincare Educator and Consultant

items.headline: Facial Techniques and Points of Difference to Enhance the Customer Journey for Long Term Retention & Relationship
objectives_summary: Learn the art of offering luxury anti-aging facials by implementing the combination of high touch hands on techniques.
Creating a customer journey during each treatment which touches on the five essential senses: touch, see, smell, hear and taste.
Creating strong perceived value and unique points of difference (PODS's) with each treatment.
